p: Phytochemicals can provide an excellent pharmacophore template for novel drug discovery used for the cure of various diseases. The crude extract/fraction and daturaolone ( 1) exhibited excellently α-glucosidase inhibition activity. Similarly, the extract/fractions and isolated daturaolone ( 1) showed potent and β-secretase activity. In this study, the extracts and natural daturaolone ( 1) inhibit α-glucosidase and β-secretase significantly and can be used as an excellent template compound for the new drug used in diabetes and AD.
